title: Introducing the Soil Health Revolution "Merit or Myth"

tasks.task: Understand the soil health revolution in agriculture.
subtasks: Listen to Buzz and Barrett introduce the topic.
Learn about Dr. Ray Wild's perspective on the current state of agriculture.
Recognize the average age of farmers and the need for younger generations.
Understand the shift from unsustainable to sustainable farming practices.
Identify the role of innovation and leading farmers in driving change.
Observe the excitement surrounding soil health in South Dakota.
Learn about the NRCS State Conservationist Jeff Zimpridge's perspective.
Hear about the importance of healthy soils for the state's success.
Acknowledge the ongoing challenge of no-till acreage stabilization.
Understand the various reasons why farmers might resist no-till farming.
Recognize the importance of research and collaboration to address concerns.
Appreciate the team's commitment to investigating merit and myth in soil health.
Anticipate the content of the upcoming series ("Merit or Myth").
